source: TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_SEQ_00<tab>The sylphs find themselves in a sticky wicket once more, and Moxia would have you provide a solution.
target: TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_SEQ_00<tab>シルフの仮宿のモキシアは、罠にはまった仲間のことで困っているようだ。

source: TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_SEQ_01<tab>The dark sylphs that inhabit the Sylphlands are at their nastiness again, this time feeding three of Moxia's friends to the sylph-eating gapemaw plants, and sealing their fearsome maws shut to prevent any attempts at escape. The perpetrators of the mischief─violet screeches, sighs, and snarls south of the Hanging Barbs─keep close guard over a lubric substance that might serve to foil their deed. Slay them and acquire the liquid to save the unfortunate sylphs from their fate.
target: TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_SEQ_01<tab>モキシアの依頼を受けた。ハンギングバーブ南にいる「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2090F01 /var>」か「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2090D01 /var>」か「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2090E01 /var>」を討伐して、<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E909901 /var>が嫌う「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E890F01 /var>」を3つ手に入れよう。

source: TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_SEQ_02<tab>You have slain the malevolent sylphs and obtained three phials of the lubric solution. Hurry and find the glue-enhanced gapemaws before Moxia's compatriots are digested.
target: TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_SEQ_02<tab>悪い子シルフたちを討伐して<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E890F01 /var>を入手した。ハンギングバーブ南に生息する「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E909901 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E890F01 /var>」を使おう。

source: TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_SEQ_03<tab>The frightful fronds will not dine on sylph this day, for Moxia's friends have been freed by your hand. Return to Little Solace to relay the good news.
target: TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E890F01 /var>を使い、<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E909901 /var>からシルフたちを救出した。シルフの仮宿の「モキシア」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_SEQ_04<tab>Moxia rejoices at the safe return of her friends, while musing about how satisfying it would be if she could feast upon the predatory plants herself. While mildly gruesome, she feels such an act would be only fitting after the anguish they have inflicted upon her people.
target: TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_SEQ_04<tab>モキシアに報告した。モキシアは、仲間のシルフが無事に救出されたことを喜び、冒険者に対して何度もお礼を言っていた。またの機会に協力しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_TODO_00<tab>Slay violet sylphs south of the Hanging Barbs and obtain phials of lubric solution.
target: TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_TODO_00<tab>ハンギングバーブ南の悪い子シルフを倒し<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E890F01 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_TODO_01<tab>Use lubric solution on gluey gapemaws.

TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_MOXIA_000_000<tab>Oh no, what is this one to do!? This one's friends will become <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((dinner)) ((breakfast)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((lunch)) ((dinner)) /var>)) /var> for chompy ones!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_MOXIA_000_000くぅ～っ、悔しいでふっち！
シルフ領に忍び込んだ仮宿の仲間が、
悪い子シルフが仕掛けた罠に、捕まっちゃったのでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_MOXIA_000_001<tab>Oh, brave one, please listen! These ones went to Sylphlands to play a trick on naughty ones, but alas! It is these ones who were tricked.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_MOXIA_000_001きっと、食虫植物「」の罠でふっち。
ベトベトの粘液に捕まったら最後……
そのまま消化されちゃう、恐ろしいヤツなのでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_MOXIA_000_002<tab>Naughty ones captured this one's friends, and fed them to nasty chomping ones! And if that was not bad enough, naughty ones smeared chompy ones' mouths with sticky-stick, making it impossible for any one to open!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_MOXIA_000_002一度捕まったら、脱出は至難の技でふっち。
「」が嫌う「」がないと、
逃げることはできないのでふっち……。

source: TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_MOXIA_000_003<tab>Only with slippery-slip can sticky mouths of chompy ones be opened, but naughty ones guard supply closely. If this one got too close, this one would only suffer the same fate as other ones!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_MOXIA_000_003「」を持ってそうな悪い子シルフには、
こころあたりがあるでふっち！
やっつけて、奪うでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_MOXIA_000_004<tab>Screeching ones, snarling ones, sighing ones─these are naughty ones that did nasty deed. Brave one, please, save this one's friends from the bellies of beastly chompy ones.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_MOXIA_000_004「」か、
「」か、
もしくは「」でふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_MOXIA_000_010<tab>Screeching ones, snarling ones, sighing ones─these are naughty ones that did nasty deed. Brave one, please, save this one's friends from the bellies of beastly chompy ones.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_MOXIA_000_010「」か、
「」か、
もしくは「」でふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_MOXIA_000_011<tab>Brave one, please! Find the slippery stuff and save this one's friends from the bellies of those beastly chomping ones!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_MOXIA_000_011こいつらから「」を奪って、
「」から仲間たちを助けるでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_SYLPHA_000_020<tab>Phew! This one thought this one was chompy-food for sure!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_SYLPHA_000_020ぷは～、助かったでふっち！
ありがとうでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_SYLPHB_000_021<tab>Ick! Look at all this sticky-stick. This one needs a wash.
target: TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_SYLPHB_000_021<tab>ぷは～、羽がベトベトでふっち～。

source: TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_SYLPHC_000_022<tab>This one...is alive? Walking one has this one's thanks.
target: TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_SYLPHC_000_022<tab>ぷは～、ちょっと死ぬかと思ったでふっち。

source: TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_MOXIA_000_030<tab>Sticky ones have returned to Little Solace safe and sound! Thank you, brave one. Sometimes this one wishes that these ones needed to eat─then these ones could chomp down on chompy ones to return the favor. Tee hee!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL302_01278_MOXIA_000_030みんな無事に帰ってきたでふっち！
ベトベトになった仲間に代わって、お礼を言うでふっち！
ほんとにほんとに、ありがとうでふっち！
